enchantment.pet_home.amphibious.desc: Pet cannot dry out or drown on land or in water, increases speed in water, pet will not float but swim quickly
Pet will be protected from damage by 2 blazing bars per level, which knockback and set attackers on fire.
enchantment.pet_home.blight_curse.desc: Plants will wither and die around the pet.
enchantment.pet_home.bubbling.desc: Pet attacks trap mob inside giant bubble that floats upwards
enchantment.pet_home.chain_lightning.des: Summons a lightning bolt that chains from and damages mobs each time a pet attacks, level increases how many mobs can be hit by lightning
enchantment.pet_home.chaos.desc: When attacked, pets inflict Chaos on the attacker, forcing them to attack other monsters within 10 blocks
enchantment.pet_home.charisma.desc: Pet lowers trade prices for its owner, level increases the bargain
enchantment.pet_home.deflection.desc: Pet is protected by a ghostly shield which deflects projectile attacks
enchantment.pet_home.defusal.desc: Pet can nullify explosion damage to terrain and other mobs, level increases range
enchantment.pet_home.disc_jockey.desc: Pet is followed by a floating jukebox that can play music discs
enchantment.pet_home.fireproof.desc: Grants pet immunity to fire and lava damage
enchantment.pet_home.frost_fang.desc: Pet attacks now slows mobs shortly and deals freezing damage
enchantment.pet_home.gluttonous.desc: Pet can eat any food item, regardless of dietary restrictions
enchantment.pet_home.healing_aura.desc: Pet will ocassionally heal owner and other pets around it, level determines strength of healing effect.
enchantment.pet_home.health_boost.desc: Increases pet's max health by 10 for each level
enchantment.pet_home.health_siphon.desc: Any damage done to pet is transferred to its owner
enchantment.pet_home.herding.desc: Pet can be followed by wild animals, level increases maximum amount of followers
enchantment.pet_home.immaturity_curse.de: Pet appears and behaves as a baby version of itself, with reduced attack damage.
enchantment.pet_home.immunity_frame.desc: Each level makes pet immune for an additional second after attack
enchantment.pet_home.infamy_curse.desc: Pet can naturally make any nearby monster hostile to it
enchantment.pet_home.insight.desc: In dark areas, pets highlight surrounding hostile mobs
enchantment.pet_home.intimidation.desc: Pet can scare away hostile mobs with its fearsome appearance, level determines range and frequency of effect
enchantment.pet_home.linked_inventory.de: Pet can pick up items and teleport them to owner's inventory
enchantment.pet_home.magnetic.desc: Pet aided by ghostly magnet that pulls targeted mobs towards it
enchantment.pet_home.muffled.desc: Pet will be silent and not emit vibrations when moving.
enchantment.pet_home.night_vision.desc: Grants Night Vision effect when a pet is nearby
enchantment.pet_home.ore_scenting.desc: Pet can sniff out ore blocks and alert its owner, level determines distance, amount and frequency of ore detection
enchantment.pet_home.paralysis.desc: When attacked, pets paralyze the attacker for several seconds, preventing movement, jumping or attacking
enchantment.pet_home.poison_resistance.d: Grants pet immunity to poison effect
enchantment.pet_home.psychic_wall.desc: Pet summons a wall of psychic energy during combat to provide cover, level determines size of wall and length of the effect
enchantment.pet_home.rejuvenation.desc: When injured, pet may absorb experience orbs to heal itself.
enchantment.pet_home.shadow_hands.desc: Pet uses dark magic to attack targets with shadowy hands, level increases speed and amount of hands
enchantment.pet_home.share.desc: When the pet is attacked, it shares damage with nearby hostile mobs
enchantment.pet_home.tethered_teleport.d: Pet will teleport with its owner, even across dimensions.
enchantment.pet_home.total_recall.desc: When below 2 health, pet enters a recall orb and is protected until released by its owner
enchantment.pet_home.tough.desc: Increase pet defense and knockback resistance
enchantment.pet_home.undead_curse.desc: Pet returns as a hostile, zombie pet after death
enchantment.pet_home.vampire.desc: Pet heals amount of damage done, level increases percentage of dealt damage healed
enchantment.pet_home.violent.desc: monster will have some debuff when attacked by pet
enchantment.pet_home.void_cloud.desc: Pet is protected from falling off cliffs or into void by a large cloud that lifts it up and returns it to its owner
enchantment.pet_home.warping_bite.desc: Pet will randomly teleport targeted mobs away from it
enchantment.pet_home.xp_transfer.desc: Pets collect and transfer XP to owner
item.pet_home.deed_of_ownership.desc: right click your pet, you can release it
message.pet_home.wayward_lantern_return: %s has found its way to a nearby Wayward Lantern
notif.friendlyfire.protected: The %s is protected. Crouch to bypass.
pet_home.configuration.blazing_protectio: Probability of Blazing Protection enchantment book
Probability of Blazing Protection enchantment book in nether fortress chests
pet_home.configuration.bubbling_loot_cha: Probability of Bubbling enchantment book in buried treasure chests
pet_home.configuration.can_hurt_all.tool: Items that bypass all mod protections to damage creatures without needing to press Shift
pet_home.configuration.can_hurt_pet_item: Items that can harm pets without needing to press Shift
pet_home.configuration.mobcatcherBlackli: Mobs that are blocked from being captured
pet_home.configuration.mobcatcherOnlyTam: Only tamable mobs can be captured
Disable to allow capturing any mob
pet_home.configuration.no_protection_ent: Creatures not to protect, e.g. Piglins
pet_home.configuration.ore_scenting_loot: Probability of Ore Scenting enchantment book
Probability of Ore Scenting enchantment book in minecart chests (abandoned mineshafts)
pet_home.configuration.other_should_prot: Other creatures to protect, e.g. villagers (immune to all attacks)
pet_home.configuration.paralysis_loot_ch: Probability of Paralysis enchantment book appearing in Abandoned Mineshaft chests, Desert Temple chests, Fishing loot
pet_home.configuration.petstore_village_: Spawn weight of Animal Tamer buildings in villages
Spawn weight of Animal Tamer buildings in villages,need to logout world and then login to take effect
pet_home.configuration.player_cant_hurt_: Creatures players cannot attack, e.g. Zombified Piglins
pet_home.configuration.protectTeamMember: No damage between creatures in the same team
pet_home.configuration.reflectDamage.too: Reflect damage (owner takes damage when attacking creatures)
Match team rules: friendly fire on/off based on team settings
pet_home.configuration.rotten_apple: Apples become rotten apples when disappearing
pet_home.configuration.rotten_apple.tool: Apples become rotten apples when disappearing
pet_home.configuration.share_loot_chance: Probability of Share enchantment book appearing in End City chests
pet_home.configuration.sinister_carrot_l: Probability of Sinister Carrot in chests
Probability of Sinister Carrot in chests
pet_home.configuration.sonic_boom_loot_c: Probability of Sonic Boom enchantment book appearing in Ancient City chests
pet_home.configuration.vampirism_loot_ch: Probability of Vampirism enchantment book in woodland mansion chests
text.pet_home.net_launcher_default_only_: By default, only tamable mobs can be captured (configurable in settings file).
text.pet_home.net_launcher_tip: [Hold Shift + Right Click to toggle between Capture and Release modes]
tooltips.pet_home.substitute_collar.desc: [Right-click on pets to put a collar on them]
tooltips.pet_home.substitute_feather.des: [Allows pets to move to the fishing rod landing point, e.g. moving pets to a pet bed]
tooltips.pet_home.substitute_pet_bed.des: [Place pets on pet beds, pets will respawn the next day after death]
tooltips.pet_home.substitute_rotten_appl: [Feed to horses to turn them into zombie horses]
tooltips.pet_home.substitute_sinister_ca: [Feed to horses to turn them into skeleton horses]
